Name: spleen angiosarcoma
Definition: An angiosarcoma and hemangioma of intra-abdominal structure and malignant soft tissue neoplasm of the spleen that results_in a nonhematolymphoid malignant neoplasm of the spleen.

Name: obsolete intraductal papillomatosis
Definition: An angiosarcoma and hemangioma of intra-abdominal structure and malignant soft tissue neoplasm of the spleen that results_in a nonhematolymphoid malignant neoplasm of the spleen.

Name: splenic manifestation of leukemia
Definition: A leukemia that is located_in the spleen. It results_in an enlargement of the leukemia.
